image-inlining-element.html.title: The performance of images: a Custom Element
image-inlining-element.html.preview: This is the second part of our series on the performance of images, in the following we will be building a Custom Element implementing the inlining technique outlined earlier.

image-inlining.html.title: The performance of images: inlining
image-inlining.html.preview: Pictures are an integral part of the web experience, but can sometimes be slow to display, especially on mobile networks. Can we make the loading of an image be perceived as instantaneous?

gzip.html.title: Your minification is not enough
gzip.html.preview: Gzip is a compression algorithm which works at its best when run against textual files. Let me show you how it works and why I believe minification can be just not enough.
